option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
Skip to main content

Get In Touch

We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions about our games, partnership opportunities, or just want to say hello.

Send us a Message

Contact Information

Email

info@atlasgames.com

Phone

+1 (234) 567-890

Office Hours

Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Saturday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM
Sunday: Closed

Follow Us

Twitter YouTube Discord

Our Location

Map coming soon - We're a remote-first team!

Frequently Asked Questions

How can I report a bug in your games?

Please use our contact form above with "Technical Support" as the subject, or reach out directly via email with details about the issue you're experiencing.

Do you offer internships or job opportunities?

We're always looking for talented individuals! Send us your portfolio and CV via the contact form with "Partnership" as the subject.

Can I suggest ideas for new games?

We love hearing creative ideas from our community! Use the "General Inquiry" option to share your thoughts with us.

How do I get press materials for your games?

For press kits, screenshots, and other media materials, select "Press Inquiry" in the contact form and we'll get back to you promptly.

option.value: [ { "slug": "indie-game-excellence-2024", "title": "Excellence in Game Design", "thumbnail": "assets/images/awards/indie-excellence-2024/trophy.jpg", "competition": "Indie Game Festival 2024", "date": "2024-10-15", "rank": "1st Place", "description": "Mystical Realms won first place for Excellence in Game Design at the prestigious Indie Game Festival 2024.", "linkedGame": "mystical-realms", "participatingMembers": ["sarah-chen", "marcus-rodriguez", "emily-watson"], "detailPath": "award-collection/indie-excellence-2024/indie-excellence-2024.html" }, { "slug": "mobile-innovation-award", "title": "Mobile Innovation Award", "thumbnail": "assets/images/awards/mobile-innovation/trophy.jpg", "competition": "Mobile Gaming Awards 2024", "date": "2024-09-22", "rank": "2nd Place", "description": "Neon Runner received recognition for innovative mobile gameplay mechanics and outstanding visual design.", "linkedGame": "neon-runner", "participatingMembers": ["marcus-rodriguez", "emily-watson"], "detailPath": "award-collection/mobile-innovation/mobile-innovation.html" }, { "slug": "best-art-direction-2024", "title": "Best Art Direction", "thumbnail": "assets/images/awards/best-art-2024/trophy.jpg", "competition": "Game Art Showcase 2024", "date": "2024-11-08", "rank": "1st Place", "description": "Our art team's exceptional work on Mystical Realms earned top honors for visual excellence and artistic innovation.", "linkedGame": "mystical-realms", "participatingMembers": ["emily-watson"], "detailPath": "award-collection/best-art-2024/best-art-2024.html" } ]

option.name: updatedContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
[ { "slug": "mystical-realms-v1-2-0", "title": "Mystical Realms v1.2.0 - Winter Update", "number": "1.2.0", "relatedGame": "mystical-realms", "date": "2024-12-20", "content": "## New Features

- Added snow-covered winter realm with unique enemies and treasures
- Introduced ice magic spells and frost resistance mechanics
- New legendary winter armor sets and weapons
- Holiday-themed quests and seasonal events

## Improvements

- Enhanced combat system responsiveness
- Improved inventory management UI
- Optimized loading times for large areas
- Better controller support for all platforms

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed issue where players could get stuck in certain dungeon areas
- Resolved audio distortion problems in underground levels
- Fixed rare save game corruption issue
- Corrected spell cooldown display inconsistencies", "youtubeEmbed": "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ", "detailPath": "patch-notes/mystical-realms-v1-2-0/mystical-realms-v1-2-0.html" }, { "slug": "neon-runner-v2-1-5", "title": "Neon Runner v2.1.5 - Performance Boost", "number": "2.1.5", "relatedGame": "neon-runner", "date": "2024-11-30", "content": "## Performance Improvements

- Reduced memory usage by 30% on mobile devices
- Improved frame rate stability across all platforms
- Optimized particle effects for better performance
- Enhanced battery life on mobile devices

## New Content

- Added 3 new character skins with unique animations
- Introduced weekly challenge mode with exclusive rewards
- New power-up: Time Dilation for slow-motion effects

## Bug Fixes

- Fixed crash issue on older Android devices
- Resolved leaderboard synchronization problems
- Fixed audio cutting out during intense gameplay sections
- Corrected hitbox inconsistencies with certain obstacles", "youtubeEmbed": null, "detailPath": "patch-notes/neon-runner-v2-1-5/neon-runner-v2-1-5.html" }, { "slug": "mystical-realms-v1-1-8", "title": "Mystical Realms v1.1.8 - Bug Fixes", "number": "1.1.8", "relatedGame": "mystical-realms", "date": "2024-11-15", "content": "## Bug Fixes

- Fixed critical bug where quest items could disappear from inventory
- Resolved issue with NPCs not responding to dialogue interactions
- Fixed problem where certain spells would not consume mana properly
- Corrected texture loading issues on high-resolution displays

## Minor Improvements

- Slightly increased drop rates for rare crafting materials
- Improved visibility of interactive objects in dark areas
- Enhanced tooltip information for spell descriptions
- Better error handling for save/load operations", "youtubeEmbed": null, "detailPath": "patch-notes/mystical-realms-v1-1-8/mystical-realms-v1-1-8.html" } ]

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: [ { "slug": "sarah-chen", "name": "Sarah Chen", "image": "assets/images/team/sarah-chen/profile.jpg", "role": "Lead Game Designer", "bio": "Sarah is a passionate game designer with over 8 years of experience in the industry. She specializes in RPG mechanics and narrative design, bringing worlds to life through compelling gameplay systems.", "skills": ["Game Design", "Narrative Design", "RPG Systems", "Player Psychology", "Prototyping"], "email": "sarah.chen@atlasgames.com", "phone": "+1 (555) 123-4567", "website": "https://sarahchen.dev", "cvDownload": "assets/documents/team/sarah-chen-cv.pdf", "socials": [ { "platform": "LinkedIn", "url": "https://linkedin.com/in/sarahchen-gamedev", "icon": "linkedin" }, { "platform": "Twitter", "url": "https://twitter.com/sarahchen_dev", "icon": "twitter" } ], "detailPath": "team-collection/sarah-chen/sarah-chen-detail.html" }, { "slug": "marcus-rodriguez", "name": "Marcus Rodriguez", "image": "assets/images/team/marcus-rodriguez/profile.jpg", "role": "Lead Developer", "bio": "Marcus is a full-stack developer who bridges the gap between creative vision and technical implementation. His expertise in multiple programming languages and game engines makes him invaluable to our development process.", "skills": ["Unity", "C#", "JavaScript", "Mobile Development", "Performance Optimization", "Backend Systems"], "email": "marcus.rodriguez@atlasgames.com", "phone": "+1 (555) 234-5678", "website": "https://marcusdev.io", "cvDownload": "assets/documents/team/marcus-rodriguez-cv.pdf", "socials": [ { "platform": "GitHub", "url": "https://github.com/marcusrod", "icon": "github" }, { "platform": "LinkedIn", "url": "https://linkedin.com/in/marcus-rodriguez-dev", "icon": "linkedin" } ], "detailPath": "team-collection/marcus-rodriguez/marcus-rodriguez-detail.html" }, { "slug": "emily-watson", "name": "Emily Watson", "image": "assets/images/team/emily-watson/profile.jpg", "role": "Art Director", "bio": "Emily brings visual magic to our games with her exceptional artistic vision. Her background in both traditional and digital art helps create the stunning visuals that define our game aesthetics.", "skills": ["Digital Art", "3D Modeling", "UI/UX Design", "Animation", "Concept Art", "Art Direction"], "email": "emily.watson@atlasgames.com", "phone": "+1 (555) 345-6789", "website": "https://emilywatson.art", "cvDownload": "assets/documents/team/emily-watson-cv.pdf", "socials": [ { "platform": "Instagram", "url": "https://instagram.com/emilywatson_art", "icon": "instagram" }, { "platform": "ArtStation", "url": "https://artstation.com/emilywatson", "icon": "artstation" } ], "detailPath": "team-collection/emily-watson/emily-watson-detail.html" } ]

Meet Our Team

Our Achievements

About Atlas Games

We are a passionate indie game development studio dedicated to creating memorable gaming experiences. Our team combines creative vision with technical expertise to bring unique worlds and engaging gameplay to life.

From epic RPG adventures to fast-paced mobile games, we explore diverse genres while maintaining our commitment to quality, innovation, and player satisfaction.

0 Games Released
0 Awards Won
0 Team Members
